author: Andrea Pham
quote: ...Ma-Talk Augmentative and Alternative Communication (AAC) has revolutionized how individuals with complex communication needs (CCNs) engage with the world...

author: Kate Falls
quote: ...This will open so many doors for children just like Matan to be a part of their community...

author: Sharyl Stevens
quote: ...Verbali has knocked down those barriers and allows for so much potential for more natural social interactions, streamlined data for progress of use, and a way for SLPs to identify the expressive and receptive needs of the user...

author: Talia Waldstreicher
quote: ...This is more than a techlological advancement-it's a chance to give a voice to childeren who've never had one...

author: Dana Goldberg
quote: ...This technology is a major step forward in an industry that has seen limited advancements...
